english.segment1: Though you are homeless. Though you're alone. I will be your home
english.segment2: Whatever's the matter. Whatever's been done. I will be your home
english.segment3: I will be your home. I will be your home. In this fearful fallen place. I will be your home
english.segment4: When time reaches fullness. When I move my hand. I will bring you home
english.segment5: Home to your own place. In a beautiful land. I will bring you home
english.segment6: I will bring you home. I will bring you home. From this fearful fallen place. I will bring you home. I will bring you home
